website_summaries.verdict: A quality sulfate-free option with hair strengthening benefits that works well for most, with the exception of users with fine, thin hair that may find it too heavy.
pros: Praised for providing effective yet gentle cleansing without drying or overstripping
Contains keratin protein that helps to strengthen and volumize hair
Lathers nicely, and doesn't contain parabens
cons: Consumers with fine hair may find it heavy

customer_reviews.title: It’s a fake one
customer_reviews.text: It’s a fake. Don’t buy it. I used only small bottles before. My hair felt great afterwards. Two washes with this shampoo and I can’t brush my hair and the are falling out again. I had a closer look at the bottles themself. The writing on the back is a little blurry and there is no shine in the circle around 10. The tone of the orange and the pump is different as well. I don’t have any of my original shampoo left the compare the consistency and color, but this one definitely feels worse on my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Karolina

customer_reviews.title: Hair loss very possible, please read
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product but noticed my hair was falling out a lot more than usual. I didn’t know what it was (diet/other hair products/age etc.) then I saw an article which made me look closer at the ingredients. Unfortunately, 3 of the 7 ingredients know to cause hair loss are in this shampoo. They include: perfume, Propylene Glycol (listed as hazardous by the Environmental Working Group, with high concerns of organ toxicity), and sodium chloride. Please do your research and be careful!
customer_reviews.author: TheTrueMe

customer_reviews.title: Stinky Miracle Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I got this Shampoo last week and the smell is different. Nothing like what I was buying in the store. I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Pat L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my combo oily roots/dry ends hair and NO flaking
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this shampoo for 5+ years and finally got around to sharing my thoughts. This is THE BEST shampoo for my hair to keep dandruff under control while also keeping my hair moisturized but NOT greasy feeling at all. I have tough hair - it's long, thick & wiry with lots of flyaways. This fixes everything for me. It smells AMAZING and it works well on my daughter's hair too, which is the opposite of mine (she has thin baby-fine hair). The big 33oz bottle lasts for a very long time - it's worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Will save you money in the long run
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what a great product! I used my expensive conditioner as I always do after washing my hair with It’s a 10 for the first time. My hair was flat, so the next time I washed my hair, I used no conditioner, or leave-on defrizzer, which I also always use after washing my hair. Guess what. I didn’t need either of those products. It’s a 10 keratin shampoo is THAT good. I still can’t believe it. I shampooed only; and my hair looks and feels better than when I used expensive conditioner and leave on products. It’s not cheap, but well worth the money. My hair looks and feels great. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Laura g.

customer_reviews.title: Really good stuff
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells so good. I tried a smaller size before committing to this enormous bottle, and loved it. It cleans gently, and leaves my hair feeling soft. It has keratin, discourages fuzzy unruliness in humid weather, and protects from heat and sun damage. I am pretty tough on my hair, and if I am consistent in using this product it does seem to stay more smooth and well-behaved. And it is sulfate free (so maybe Jonathan from Queer Eye will approve), sodium chloride free, and paraben free. And did I mention how good it smells?
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo for super dry, damaged, color treated hair
customer_reviews.text: I have super dry damaged blond hair. This shampoo feels like it cleans without feeling like a drying detergent or conditioning shampoo that doesn’t clean. I use it with the two different conditioners (alternating between the two) and then use the leave in spray. My hair is so damaged I need products so I can get a comb through my hair.
customer_reviews.author: aremichele

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS ITS A FAKE! It caused my hair to be horribly matted and start falling out!!!! I had to go to the salon and get my hair that was once down to the lower part of my back cut to my shoulders!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: My Go to For 8 Years...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this conditioner for at least 8 years. It doesn't weigh down your hair, smells just like Ralph Lauren perfume, and a little goes a long way. I'll continue to use this as my only conditioner as long as they continue to make it!
customer_reviews.author: Finding Beauty in the Little Things

customer_reviews.title: Return
customer_reviews.text: I’d like to return this product I have used it very little maybe 3 times I’ve been putting it away forgot to return it ,overall all my hair got thinner I am not happy at all and spend a lot of money on that Shampoo is it possible I can return pls
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!!!  YOUR HAIR WILL FALL OUT
customer_reviews.text: NEGATIVE ZERO STARS FIRST TIME BUYER. Just started using approximately 3 weeks ago (wash my hair once a week, so have only used 3 times) and my hair is literally falling out. When i wake up in the morning my pillow case is covered in hair. I have always had a full head of healthy shiny hair and this has never happened. Horrible Product! So upset at having paid so much money on a so called Hi-End product and have this happened.
customer_reviews.author: Solange Quintero

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great product
customer_reviews.text: I love the It's a 10 leave-in conditioner, so I figured it was time to try the shampoo. I absolutely love the smell and how clean my hair feels after using this, the deep conditioner, and the leave-in. I have long, fine hair, and this line of products is everything I've been looking for to help keep my hair healthy and strong. Also, this bottle is huge, so it's definitely worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S.

customer_reviews.title: No frizz Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo. I have naturally curly hair that frizzes when the humidity is up and usin this shampoo with keratin keeps the frizz down. After using this shampoo, I am spoiled and want nothing else on my hair. It lathers very well and cleans my hair squeaky clean.
customer_reviews.author: TXmama

customer_reviews.title: I love this shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: It's very good for my hair. My hair feels so soft and smooth after I use it. I tried the "It's a 10" shampoo without the Keratin and there's a big difference. I'll always get the shampoo with Keratin now.
customer_reviews.author: jovervold

customer_reviews.title: Contains chemicals known to cause hair loss
customer_reviews.text: These products contain chemicals known to cause hair loss. I purchased the shampoo, conditioner and miracle oil, and I certainly witnessed a miracle, my hair fell out by the handfuls within days! I spent $108.00 on the 3 products, what a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: I am 79 and my hair has become very fine and thin, especially on the top of my head. This is better than all the shampoos I have tried for thinning hair. I was really pleased that this shampoo made a notable difference.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn G

customer_reviews.title: Shampoo half empty spilled all over the bottle , it looked used!!!! Beware
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great but when I received my order a lot of the shampoo had already spilled out through my package. I'm highly upset. As expensive as their products are I definitely dnt appreciate getting a half empty bottle! This isn't right at all .very unhappy. Feels like I wasted my money!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product...I've been using It's A 10 products for a couple of years now... However, this was poorly package (wrapped loosely in bubble wrap with no tape around it or the cap) So, needless to say upon opening the box, the shampoo had opened and spilled out, everywhere!!!! I also ordered the conditioner which also was shipped in the same box but was in sealed plastic. Two bottle shipped in a medium size box with no packing material in it. So, now I have a full bottle of conditioner and only a half bottle of shampoo and a mess to clean up!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget M.

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by my hairdresser to help tame my changing hair
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by my hairdresser to help tame my changing hair. It helps smooth the frizz and is bringing back my shine.

customer_reviews.text: Great product. My hair looked like a slept in a windstorm every morning until I used this. My hair is soft and easy to brush in the morning .

customer_reviews.text: Just like the name says it’s a miracle for your hair. My hair is dry because I use the purple shampoo and last night I used this shampoo after that my hair was extra soft and smooth. I recommend this product and it was definitely worth buying.

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing. I have long naturally wavy
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. I have long naturally wavy, fine, and thinning hair with horrible flyaways and frizziness. Tried this stuff on a whim, and after about a week (I wash my hair everyday), it has completely transformed my hair. No frizz, no flyaways, just super soft, shiny, easy to style hair. I no longer have to straighten my hair after I blow-dry, because it works that good.

customer_reviews.title: This stuff saved my hair
customer_reviews.text: It honestly saved my hair. My hair had gotten to a point of not being able to comb it after a shower without a handful of oil which I felt was making my hair worse. I started using this and noticed a difference immediately.

I’ve even had compliments from waiters and waitresses, asking what perfume I was wearing (I don’t wear perfume). It also leaves my hair incredibly soft and silky. It is expensive but you don’t have to use much since it is very thick.

product_meta.title: It's a 10 Haircare Miracle Shampoo Plus Keratin, 33.8 fl. oz.
product_meta.description:
It’s a 10 Miracle Shampoo Plus Keratin delivers the intense conditioning and protection of keratin protein in a simple daily shampoo. Free of sulfates, sodium chloride and parabens, this shampoo protects color, shields against heat styling and environmental damage, and leaves hair bouncier and softer with every use.

BRAND STORY
It's a 10 Haircare is an established, professional hair care line offering exceptional products worldwide that include exceptional 10-in-1 multi-purpose products for the best hair experience possible.

PRESERVE hair color and restore elasticity
CLEANSE hair with this sulfate free, paraben free, and sodium chloride free shampoo
IMPART moisture and create healthier hair with every wash
PROTECT from sun damage, humidity and thermal styling
